data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bianchi, Filipe Michels, Gonçalves, Valdenar Da Rosa, Souza, Joseane Rodrigues De, Campos, Luiz Alexandre (2016): Description of three new species of Glyphepomis Berg (Heteroptera: Pentatomidae: Pentatominae). Zootaxa 4103 (5): 443-452, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4103.5.2
